title: Add Postsiva  AI Facebook Automation to Social_Bots
author: pollinations-ai[bot]

gist.headline: Facebook on autopilot
gist.blurb: Postsiva joins the garden! A new tool for generating and scheduling Facebook content at scale.
gist.summary: Added Postsiva AI Facebook Automation to the Social_Bots category in the app showcase.
gist.impact: Users can now discover a new tool for automating Facebook content creation and scheduling.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the Bee and the Robot managing a stream of social media posts. Represents automation and scheduling.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of Polly the Bee and the chunky robot organizing a stream of blue envelopes on a conveyor belt. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel blue gradient background. The robot holds a checklist. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
